mean_en: a set of stairs that go from one level or floor to another
word_etyma: stair楼梯 + way道路 → stairway 楼道，楼梯
short_phrase: a stairway to the second floor
sentence: There is a stairway to the fourth floor at the end of that hall.
sentence_trans: 在大厅的尽头有个通往四楼的楼梯。
sentence_phrase: a stairway to the fourth floor
